channel.title: [PI] DevastationX - Spawning. Apply now! This is going to be BIG!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/logonew.png[/img] *NEW* Moderator Position was added! [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/intro.png[/img] DevastationX is a spawning/Pickup Private server. We have great plans in the future, we are going to have a $600 starting capital which we are planning on using to host/advertise. DevastationX is not a Hybrid PVP V3 server, instead it's a Orical-X based RSPS. Our goal is to have amazing and exciting PKing zones which include both single and multi PVP areas, we are allowing players to experience a great and more up-to-date style of PVP'ing which include the summoning NPC's, These NPC's will help you kill players/NPC. The server has a Kills Requirements system which prevents people from having full access to every weapon avaliable. Instead, they would be obligated to reach a certain amount of Kills before being given the ability to wear a certain item. We also offer tags for PKers who care about respect. E.G. If you reach 1,000 kills you are given a yell tag of a "legendary PKer". [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/Supportteam.png[/img] [b]Server Sided Programmer[/b] Luis Darcy Stupit pk2play (Pending) Omgitsshane [b]Client Sided Programmer[/b] Darcy Stupit [b]Media Artist[/b] Luis [b]Webmaster[/b] Luis Stupit [b]Moderator[/b] Ethan [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/application.png[/img] * - Required Information [b]Server Sided Programmer[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: [/code] [b]Client Sided Programmer[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: [/code] [b]Media Artist[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: [/code] [b]Webmaster[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: [/code] [b]Moderator[/b] [code] Name: Gender: Age: Why should I consider you (Apply effort into this question): How active are you: Timezone: [/code] [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/media.png[/img] Home Area [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/home-4.jpg[/img] Single PVP-Zone [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/fs-1.jpg[/img] Multi PVP-Zone [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/multi.jpg[/img] Korasi Special [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/korasi.jpg[/img] Dragon Claws Special [IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/claws-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/contact.png[/img] MSN: rsps-helpdesk@hotmail.com Alternative MSN: luisvictoria15_@hotmail.com
[IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/credits.png[/img] Asshole_rule P0sesed_soul (Darcy) Sanity [/center]

item.title: [PI] DevastationX - Spawning. Apply now! This is going to be BIG!
item.dc:creator: @apocalypsePK apocalypsePK
item.description:
@apocalypsePK wrote:

Name:Johnny
Gender: Male
Age:15
Why should I consider you (Apply effort into this question): Why would i make a good moderator? I would make a good mod because i have had Been mod many times on various servers. silentX was a server with 100+ people, now it is dead so i dont go on that anymore and i have resigned from being mod there. I have also owned and been admin aswell as co-owner on many servers, when i was mod on silentX people liked me, because i was fair to them and i would never abuse any powers. If 2 hours+ a day isnt enough i can put more time into the server. I dont have much else to say other than when i get a staff position i stick to that server untill its dead. and i dont go to others. Im fair with players and other people, i give them chances that they deserve, if they do it again or if it was bad enough i would do the proper thing to make it right then message you or put it on the forums why and the proof that that person has been banned or what ever reason it is. I dont have anything else to say other than, I think i would be a good addition to your team and if you dont accept its alright as there are many others.
How active are you: it all depends, my average is 2hrs a day if im not out with family/friends. thats 5 days a week. when i get more time it will go up to 4hours+
Timezone: EST standard

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DevastationX - Spawning. Apply now! This is going to be BIG!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Name: Jason
Gender: M
Age: 15, nearly 16
Why should I consider you (Apply effort into this question):
Where should I begin? Unlike most of the community, I’m not an immature, rage filled 12 yr old. When I want something to get done, I make sure it gets done. I’ve been a part of the community since 08, and first started pservers around 07. My grammar is correct, and pretty OCD about stuff. I keep strong order and have little tolerance for bullshit.
How active are you: How active am I as in how often do I get on the computer? Plenty. You can’t judge my activity based on something that doesn’t yet exist or that I haven’t been active to at all.
Timezone: -5

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] DevastationX - Spawning. Apply now! This is going to be BIG!
item.dc:creator: @owner5 owner5
item.description:
@owner5 wrote:

Name: omar
Gender: male
Age: 17
Why should I consider you (Apply effort into this question):well i was a co owner for server called Deadlyscape back in 08 and i kept the position for about 3 years until the server was shut down. I took a couple of months off from Runescape servers. Anyway all i want to do is become a help for this server, i want become part of what looks like an incredible project and i believe it will become big. I want to be part of this process and i want to help out the community in any way. Because when i help out as much as i can, i know players will continue to play, because of a great staff (which i promise i will be). Im not in it for the power, to be honest a moderators aren’t respected in many servers. That’s because they abuse their power. Im not an idiot and i dont plan on doing that. So i hope you get a chance to see this and understand that i am free and im ready to give this project all i got.

How active are you: Well ive taken a brake from RSPS’s but im incredibly active now and you will see me on all the time, trust me.

Timezone:Eastern Time Zone

Read full topic

item.description:
@paymon wrote:

Name:PAYMON
Gender:MALE
Age:16
Years Of Experience:2 IN PROGRAMMING, 4 IN MARKETING
Apply Positions: PROGRAMMING, MARKETING
Previous Work:
Successful servers:
crusadex.com,
torvascape.com,
crusadeeco.tk,
perfectionx.tk,

marketing:

brandbucket.com

Zylip is for sale on BrandBucket

Learn how the name Zylip.com can become a killer brand for your next company or product.


Many IRL business that i have ran over the years.

Contact Information:
will PM you.

How Active Will you be:
got my business to run too, so around 4 hours a day.

More information:
My main strength is marketing, i can get make your costs as low as possible, while making your income as high as possible. I have proof of my previous success, for example my newest server “crusadex.com” got around 600 mill RSGP and £200 in donations in 2 weeks. However the most successful of my servers was “torvascape.com” which was running around 4 months ago, in the 2 months that was running, i managed to get more then $2000 dollars. Paypal became a bitch though when they found out i was 16. I spent the money though…

item.title: [PI] DevastationX - Spawning. Apply now! This is going to be BIG!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:57, topic:406313”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=503310.msg3690918#msg3690918 date=1312126134]

DevastationX is not a Hybrid PVP V3 server, instead it’s a Orical-X based RSPS.

I lol’d at that.

If you had a brain you would know they are two different things. Orical-X is not a leech of Hybrid PVP.

Either way your just leeching a source and making spawn for everyone. There aren’t huge differences in the sources anyway, no need to get all offended when someone says your leeching the wrong source.

  1. I addded summoning
  2. Added Handcannon
  3. Added achievements
  4. Added player tags
  5. Added a modified random PVP drops (it’s a spawn anymore, you are going to get 3 random items everytime. and there are 3 categories. High, Low and medium rate)
  6. Added 2 quests
  7. Added shortcuts (ctrl + R = restart server)
  8. Modified hotkeys

…

Don’t talk bull because your source isn’t anything special either. Every source is leeched if you ask me.

Which source of mine isn’t anything special? I work on/release lots of sources. Be more specific, and maybe your right and they aren’t very special 100% of the time, but I don’t bitch at people like your doing and be like AMG NO I RIP SUMMONING FROM OTHER SOURCE GET IT RIGHT!@!@!@ Either way I thought Orical-X already had summoning from looking at Asshole_rule’s development topic of it.
[/quote]

I added summoning for him.

(yes i ripped the summoning from PF)[/quote]

Ofc you did it for him

Read full topic
